body: Also, just as an aside: please support the author if any of you readers can. Link here: https://ec.toranoana.jp/tora_r/ec/item/040030448461/ Also consider helping a friend of mine out if you're looking for art commissions. He drew my avatar that I currently use and any support is appreciated there too. https://ko-fi.com/sevixfremy. (This post is entirely about supporting artists, thank you for your time.)
@Epicsword: No problem, I don't mind that. Just keep me updated.

Thank you Rainsong for translating this work as always. No objection from my side , this looks fantastic. Looking forward for next work to be translated. It should be #1 but I will make a slight detour from it. And again thanks for translating this .
Bismarck will always have the best Doujinshi collection ever
